titles.title: O Light of light, shine in

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Light of light, shine in! Cast out this night of sin, Create true day within: O Light of light, shine in!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O Light, all light excelling, Make my heart Thy dwelling; O Joy, all grief dispelling, To my poor heart come in!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O Joy of joys, come in! End Thou this grief of sin, Create calm peace within: O Joy of joys, come in!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Life of life, pour in! Expel this death of sin, Awake true life within: O Life of life, pour in!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O Love of love, flow in! This hateful root of sin Deal with, renew, within: O Love of love, flow in!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Heaven of heavens, descend! This cloudy curtain rend, And all earthâ€™s turmoil end: O Heaven of heavens, descend!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: My God and Lord, O come! Of joys the Joy and Sum, Make in this heart Thy home: My God and Lord, O come!
